author: Periodic Videos
description:
Nearly 10 years after dropping Lithium into 7 Up, we dig out the same batch of Li and try it with the "Zero Sugar" version of 7 Up. More links and info in full description ↓↓↓

Bonus content from this video: https://www.patreon.com/posts/147557664

Previous Lithium in 7 Up video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ofNN1b7xzFw

Information about studying AI and Digital Chemistry at Nottingham (as mentioned by The Prof): https://www.nottingham.ac.uk/pgstudy/course/taught/ai-and-digital-chemistry-msc
And more about studying chemistry: https://www.nottingham.ac.uk/chemistry/studywithus/index.aspx 

This video features Sir Martyn Poliakoff and Neil Barnes from The University of Nottingham.

Videos on all 118 elements: http://bit.ly/118elements

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/periodicvideos

More chemistry at http://www.periodicvideos.com/
From the School of Chemistry at The University of Nottingham: http://bit.ly/NottChem

This episode was also generously supported by The Gats
title: Lithium dropped in 7 Up (the Zero Sugar version) - Periodic Table of Videos
